mapper.select: SELECT count(*) From QnA AS Q LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (Q.user_id = U.user_id)

SELECT Q.qna_id AS "QnAId", Q.title AS "QnATitle",Q.created_date AS "QnACreatedDate", U.user_id AS "UserId", U.email AS "UserEmail", U.nickname AS "UserNickName", R.qna_id AS "ReplyId", R.title AS "ReplyTitle", P.product_id AS "ProductId" FROM Qna AS Q LEFT OUTER JOIN User AS U on (Q.user_id = U.user_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN QnA AS R on (Q.reply_id = R.qna_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN Product AS P on (Q.product_id = P.product_id) WHERE Q.qna_id = #{qnaId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnA ( title, user_id, product_id, parent_id, created_date ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{creator.userId}, #{product.productId}, #{parent.qnaId}, now() )
